Text: Does not work, I get Install errors.

Works fine for me!  Ran the installer using supplied key, continued through the "previous installation check", received one file error during install (ignored it) and finished installing just fine. Cheers! :)    [Win7 Ultimate, Athlon 64x2 5200+, 2GBram, 2.7gz, GeForce 8800 GT]

When running setup, I get "Adobe Illustrator 10 upgrade installer requires proof of ownership of the following products".  Unable to continue to where the included serial can be entered.

I would avoid this one people!
